otpCode.text: Enter the 6-digit code we sent to your email to verify your identity

qrScreen.title: Set up Two-Factor Authentication
qrScreen.description:
To secure your account, please follow these steps:

1. Download and install the Google Authenticator app on your mobile device.
2. Open the app and select 'Scan a QR code'.
3. Scan the QR code displayed on this screen.
4. Once scanned, the app will generate a 6-digit code.
5. Enter the code in the next step and press 'Continue' to complete the setup.

After completing these steps, your account will be protected with Two-Factor Authentication.
